posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cy Young and M. Brown portraits
posts.post_content:
Offering a couple low-grade t206 HOF portraits I've been able to upgrade. The Brown is clearly trimmed but authentic. Price includes shipping/insurance with paypal (gift) or add 3% for regular paypal. Happy to answer any questions at [url]javanbrigham@verizon.net[/url]

T206 Cy Young BVG 1 - SOLD
T206 M. Brown          -SOLD

posts.post_title: Bump for lower price T206 Young portrait
